concept.title: Reordering the login module
concept.shortdesc: Use the administration console to reorder the login module.

ol.li: Expand Java Authentication and Authorization Service under the Authentication heading and select System logins.
Select the relevant alias from the list. The login module must be reordered for the DEFAULT, WEB_INBOUND and RMI_INBOUND aliases.
Select the JAAS login modules link under the Additional Properties heading.
Select curam.util.security.CuramLoginModule and select Move Up. Repeat this step until the CuramLoginModule entry is the top entry in the list.
Select OK to confirm the modifications to the order.
